directions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Combine chicken, salsa and beans in 9-inch-diameter glass pie dish; stir to blend well. Spoon potatoes atop filling in pie dish, covering completely. Sprinkle with cheese and half of cilantro. Bake casserole until filling is bubbling, cheese melts and potatoes are beginning to brown, about 20 minutes. Sprinkle with remaining cilantro.
ingredients: 1 cup purchased mild or medium-hot chunky salsa
1/2 cup (packed) shredded hot pepper Monterey Jack cheese
title: Tex-Mex Sheperd's Pie
